meanings: (물건이) break, (산산조각 나다) smash, shatter, (금이 가다) crack
아침의 행동을 나타내는 표현 My contact lens is cracked.

vlive.korean: 깨졌어? Did it crack? 듣기 View video Apink : Apink's Broadcast(나은이의 광고촬영현장 놀러와아)
깨졌어요! 깨트렸어요! He broke the shell! He broke the shell! - I broke the shell! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 48 - 호주쓰!!
vlive.english: He broke the shell! He broke the shell! - I broke the shell!

examples.korean: ‘It’s broken.’ ‘Oh yes, I see what you mean.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “그건 깨졌어.” “아, 그렇구나. 무슨 뜻인지 알겠어.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘It’s broken.’ ‘Oh yes, I see what you mean.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Heartbroken. My heart just shattered into a million pieces. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가슴이 찢어졌어. 내 마음이 백만 조각으로 산산이 깨졌어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Heartbroken. My heart just shattered into a million pieces. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The email in Chinese is all garbled and I can’t read any of it. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 중국어로 된 이메일이 전부 글자가 깨졌어. 하나도 읽을 수가 없어. DARAKWON
examples.english: The email in Chinese is all garbled and I can’t read any of it. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The vase was broken in the process of moving. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 옮기는 도중에 꽃병이 깨졌어. Neungyule
